chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: lb
a: lb
m: lb
l: lb

Goal:
l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↑ a ⪯ m ↑ b

Premises:
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> (l ++ a) ↓ (m ++ b) = l ↓ m ++ a ↓ b
lb_mask_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> m ⪯ k -> l ⪯ k
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_join_comm : forall l m : lb, l ↑ m = m ↑ l
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_sym : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
andb_prop : forall a b : bool, a && b = ⟙ -> a = ⟙ /\ b = ⟙
lb_mask_inv_cons_cons : forall l m : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ ⟘ :: m -> False
lb_meet_length : forall a b : lb, length a = length b -> length (a ↓ b) = length a
lb_join_length_le : forall (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (l ↑ m) <= n
lb_join_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↑ (y :: m) = x || y :: l ↑ m
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments Ring_theory.div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
lb_mask_inv_nil : forall l : lb, ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_left : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), x :: l ⪯ nil -> x = ⟘ /\ l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_cons_nil : forall l : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ nil -> False
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
lb_mask_equiv_cons_Proper = fun (x y : bool) (H : x = y) => eq_ind_r (fun x0 : bool => Morphisms.respectful lb_mask_equiv lb_mask_equiv (cons x0) (cons y)) (fun (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun y1 : bool => if y1 as b return (forall x1 y2 : lb, x1 ≂ y2 -> b :: x1 ≂ b :: y2) then fun (x1 y2 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y2) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => conj (lb_mask_leb ⟙ ⟙ eq_refl H2) (lb_mask_leb ⟙ ⟙ eq_refl H3) end else fun (x1 y2 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y2) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => conj (lb_mask_leb ⟘ ⟘ I H2) (...
lb_mask_le_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⪯ x0 < -> y ⪯ y0
